title: ucchiSTha gaNapatau
sahitya:
ucchiSTa gaNapatau bhaktim krtvA unnata padavIm vrajarE rE hrdaya


anupallavi

 sacchabda vAcA svarUpiNi shabaLI krta brahmasvarUpiNi 
cicchakti sphUrtti svarUpiNi cidAnanda nAtha svarUpiNi


caraNam   nArI yOnI mukhA svAdanE nagna rAmakriyA mOdanE 
bhErI vINA vENu vAdanE bhEdA jnAna dhvAnta sUdanE 
shaurinutE nata guruguha madanE sUrijanayuta shrIpura sadanE 
dUrI krta mahA durita kadanE gaurIsha nandanE gajavadanE
